snippet: Nerlens Noel is a 6-foot-10 basketball star considered the best prospect from the Boston area since Patrick Ewing and is hailed as the best shot blocker of his generation.
abstract: Nerlens Noel is a 6-foot-10 high school basketball star considered the best prospect from the Boston area since Patrick Ewing; is the top-ranked senior in the country, and hailed as the best shot blocker of his generation, all of which make Noel's future seem blindingly bright; the catch is that he is immersed in the murky world of major-college recruiting, filled with fringe figures hoping to latch on to a commodity, and choosing whom to listen to could mean the difference between a future of NBA riches or becoming a cautionary tale.
lead_paragraph: Nerlens Noel is a 6-foot-10 basketball star considered the best prospect from the Boston area since Patrick Ewing and is hailed as the best shot blocker of his generation.

headline.main: Everybody Wants a Piece of Nerlens Noel
headline.print_headline: Everybody Wants a Piece of Nerlens Noel
